title: Debate, KY Rep. Andy Barr, Ohio Politics
itunes:title: Debate, KY Rep. Andy Barr, Ohio Politics
description:
Guests: Ohio Democratic Party Chairman David Pepper, Sarah Ponczek, Bloomberg Markets Reporter, Adam Goodman, Republican media strategist, columnist and partner at Ballard Partners, Adam Hodge, Senior Vice President at Ariel Investments, and Congressman Andy Barr, a Republican representing Kentucky's 6th congressional district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
